title: Game Progress Route
content:
ombstones'. However, due to her constraints, she defers the investigation to you. Reply with:

I should probably seek out a hand, then. Can you pinpoint the location of 'Candulhallow's Tombstones'? It sounds like you have a lot on your plate. I'll handle this. I'll look into it.

Choose the fourth option. Devella plans to head to the upper city, meeting you at Basilisk Gate later. Lastly, loot Dolor's body and acquire the "Hand Bag," updating the Main Quest "Impress the Murder Tribunal."
